reuters.title: KINGS ROAD ENTERTAINMENT <KREN> 3RD QTR LOSS
reuters.body: Qtr ended Jan 31 Shr loss seven cts vs loss 64 cts Net loss 367,000 vs loss 3,009,000 Revs 2,516,000 vs 8,787,000 Nine mths Shr loss 73 cts vs loss 1.17 dlrs Net loss 3,545,000 vs loss 4,573,000 Revs 6,768,000 vs 13.3 mln Reuter 
